intro: Stellularia paniculata, commonly known as the panicled starwort, is a herbaceous plant native to North America. It belongs to the family Cyperaceae, commonly known as the sedge family. The plant features grass-like leaves and produces small, clustered flowers that are typically greenish or brownish in color. It thrives in wetland environments such as marshes and along the edges of ponds. Stellularia paniculata is often found in moist, disturbed soils and is adapted to tolerate periodic flooding.
